# @axm-internal/repo-cli
Version: 0.1.0

Purpose:
- Run Codex prompt runners for repo workflows.

Public surface:
- CLI entry at `src/cli.ts`

Intended usage:
- Internal axm-internals maintainers automating checklist/llms/docs prompts.

Non-goals:
- General-purpose prompt runner outside this monorepo.

Stability expectations:
- Semver within axm-internals.
